channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DoorDash unveils Dot, its first commercial autonomous delivery robot
item.description: DoorDash said Dot is faster than other delivery robots and can travel on roads, sidewalks, or bike lanes. The post DoorDash unveils Dot, its first com...

item.title: Machina Labs uses robotics, AI to customize automotive body manufacturing
item.description: Machina Labs has partnered with Toyota to develop new methods of metal forming for more customizable vehicles. The post Machina Labs uses robotics, AI...

item.title: Alphabet’s stock just had its best quarter in two decades thanks to AI
item.description: Alphabet’s Class A stock rose 38% in the third quarter as Google’s Gemini and cloud-computing businesses took off, defying doubters.

item.title: Qualcomm promises it can be an AI winner. What does it know that Nvidia and Intel don’t?
item.description: Qualcomm shares may have more growth potential than the market is currently pricing in —but some big hurdles lie ahead.

item.title: Here’s how much your health insurance could go up next year — whether there’s a government shutdown or not
item.description: Millions of Americans are poised to pay more for their health insurance next year.

item.title: Why Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway may be placing another bet in petrochemicals
item.description: Berkshire is in talks to buy Occidental’s chemicals business for $10 billion. A deal would come as a surprise for markets, analysts say.
